content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's focus on the rental price. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is newly built and in the city center, I would like to offer 500 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low. I am looking for a higher price considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
